Package moulton.scalable.clickables

Interface TouchResponsiveComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimatedButton, Button, Clickable, FormButton, ImageButton, PolygonalButton, RadioButton, ScrollBar, StaticTextBox, TextBox
public interface TouchResponsiveComponent
Interface for components that should be responsive to being touched, meaning having the mouse cursor on part of them that would in most cases be clickable. A notable class that implements this is Clickable and thus all subclasses of buttons and text boxes.
Author:
Matthew Moulton

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    EventAction getTouchAction()
    Touch Responsive Components may optionally provide an EventAction that should be executed when the component is first touched and when it stops being touched.
    int getTouchedCursorType()
    Should return the cursor type that should be used when this component is touched.
    boolean isTouched()
    Whether this component thinks that it is touched.
    boolean isTouchedAt​(int x, int y)
    Whether the coordinates of (x,y) define a point that touches this component.
    void setTouched​(boolean touched)
    When the MenuManager is processing mouse movement, the results of isTouchedAt(int, int) for the coordinates of the mouse will be passed through this method to update whether this component is touched.

  • Method Details

    • isTouchedAt

      boolean isTouchedAt​(int x, int y)
      Whether the coordinates of (x,y) define a point that touches this component.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the point in question
      y - the y-coordinate of the point in question
      Returns:
      Whether the point touches the component

    • setTouched

      void setTouched​(boolean touched)
      When the MenuManager is processing mouse movement, the results of isTouchedAt(int, int) for the coordinates of the mouse will be passed through this method to update whether this component is touched. Therefore, this method is responsible for informing the component whether it is touched, whatever effect that may have.
      Parameters:
      touched - update as to whether the component is touched by the mouse

    • isTouched

      boolean isTouched()
      Whether this component thinks that it is touched.
      Returns:
      the variable's touched condition as of last time it was updated.

    • getTouchAction

      EventAction getTouchAction()
      Touch Responsive Components may optionally provide an EventAction that should be executed when the component is first touched and when it stops being touched. At the time the EventAction is executed, the component should know its new touch status through setTouched(boolean).
      Returns:
      the event action to execute. null is acceptable.

    • getTouchedCursorType

      int getTouchedCursorType()
      Should return the cursor type that should be used when this component is touched. The result will be handled by MenuManager and passed off to the container via Container.setCursor(int).
      Returns:
      the cursor type constant, to be used by Container.setCursor(int)
